product.name: Slim Fit Suit Vest
product.description: Suit vest in woven fabric with shiny woven fabric at back. Buttons at front, a chest pocket, welt front pockets, and adjustable tab at back. Lined.
product.importedBy: H&M Hennes & Mauritz Retail Pvt. Ltd. A-wing, D-3, 2nd Floor District Centre Saket New Delhi -110017 India

materialDetails.name: Polyester
materialDetails.description: Polyester is a synthetic fiber made from crude oil (a fossil resource).

materialDetails.name: Rayon
materialDetails.description: Viscose is a regenerated cellulose fiber commonly made from wood, but the raw material could also consist of other cellulosic materials.

materialDetails.description: Elastane is an elastic synthetic fiber made from oil (a fossil resource).
